pages.text: In this chapter, we'll cover the fundamentals of magic, including its origins, its various forms, and its role in the world of Infernal Nature.$(br)$(li)Origins of Magic $(li)Forms of Magic $(li)The Role of Magic

$(l)Origins of Magic$()$(br2)The origins of magic can be traced back to ancient mages, the first people to explore the mysteries of the natural world. Over time, they developed techniques for harnessing the power of magic, and eventually, it became a cornerstone of their societies.
$(l)Forms of Magic$()$(br2)Magic takes many forms, including Infernal, Nature and Mystic. Each type of magic has its own strengths and weaknesses, and requires different techniques to master.

$(l)The Role of Magic$()$(br2)Magic plays a crucial role in the world of Infernal Nature. From the summoning of portals to the dungeons to the creation of powerful artifacts, magic is an essential part of life for those who seek adventure and power.
